item.title: Let's Talk About Australian Public Toilets.
item.description: I found this weird dataset about toilets so I decided to analyze it.

item.title: Hello, Bouncy Bao!
item.description: I made a game about a bouncing steamed bun with C# and Unity. (WARNING! This video has sound that plays automatically.)

item.title: Aether Features
item.description: Hugo combined with the Aether theme turns easy to write markdown into powerful web pages. KaTeX, Highlight.js, and Hugo provides the ability to create mathmatical symobols, equations, highlighted code, tables, lists, and much more.
